titles.title: Baseball Antitrust Restoration Amendment of 1995
To amend the Act of September 30, 1961, to exclude professional baseball from the antitrust exemption applicable to certain television contracts.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Baseball Antitrust Restoration Amendment of 1995 - Excludes professional baseball from the antitrust exemption applicable to the telecasting of professional sports contests.
